source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_SEQ_00<tab>At the Glittering Basin, Gyorin is making it all too obvious he wants you to talk to him.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_SEQ_00<tab>Gyorin möchte, dass du ihn begleitest.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_SEQ_01<tab>Gyorin decides to seek the counsel of Gyofu in his unrelenting pursuit of mercantile greatness. Travel to Yuzuka Manor and speak with Gyorin once more.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_SEQ_01<tab>Gyorin weiß nicht mehr weiter und entschließt sich, Gyofu um Rat zu bitten. Sprich mit Gyorin beim Yuzuka-Herrenhaus.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_SEQ_02<tab>Gyofu tells Gyorin that there are treasures still buried within the ruins of a Garlean stronghold to the east. Gyorin ignores Gyofu's warnings and departs for the ruins immediately. Follow Gyorin, and speak to him at the Glittering Basin.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_SEQ_02<tab>Gyofu erzählt euch, dass in der Ruine des garleischen Stützpunkts im Osten sicherlich Schätze zu finden sind, doch er warnt euch vor gefährlichen Gegnern, auf die ihr dort treffen könntet. Gyorin hat nur bis zum Wort „Schätze“ zugehört und fordert dich auf, ihn sofort dorthin zu begleiten. Triff Gyorin im Goldbecken.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_SEQ_03<tab>Gyorin continues in the direction of the Garlean stronghold ruins. Follow him once more, and speak to him in Castrum Fluminis.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_SEQ_03<tab>Du sprichst mit Gyorin, der sich sogleich auf den Weg nach Castrum Fluminis macht. Folge ihm zur Ruine des garleischen Stützpunkts und sprich dort erneut mit ihm.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_SEQ_04<tab>Gyorin discovers a band of Lupin, and asks you to create a diversion. Defeat Lupin looters in Castrum Fluminis.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_SEQ_04<tab>Gyorin hat gefährlich aussehende Wolfswesen ausgemacht und möchte, dass du dich um sie kümmerst. Besiege <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 03F216FB030502 /var> in Castrum Fluminis.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_SEQ_05<tab>You defeated the Lupin looters. Speak with Gyorin in Castrum Fluminis.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_SEQ_05<tab>Du hast <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 03F216FB030502 /var> aus dem Weg geräumt. Sprich mit Gyorin.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_SEQ_06<tab>Gyorin tells you that he was able to find something valuable while you were distracting the Lupin. Return to Yuzuka Manor and speak with Gyorin once more.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_SEQ_06<tab>Während du dich mit den Wolfswesen rumgeschlagen hast, ist Gyorin fündig geworden! Er will sofort zurückkehren und Gyofu fragen, ob sein Fund etwas wert ist. Kehre zum Yuzuka-Herrenhaus zurück und sprich dort erneut mit Gyorin.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_SEQ_07<tab>Gyofu appraises Gyorin's haul, and determines that all of the weapons can be sold after some minor repairs. Upon hearing the good news, Gyorin resolves to open his own shop, which he will name The New Rich, and continue on the path to greatness.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_SEQ_07<tab>Gyofu ist der Meinung, dass sich die gefundenen Waffen nach ein paar kleineren Reparaturen sicherlich zu Gil machen lassen. Er empfiehlt Gyorin, den Gewinn zu investieren. Gyorin fasst darauf den Entschluss, ein Geschäft namens „Raffkes Rüstkammer“ zu eröffnen und auf diesem Wege endlich reich zu werden.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_000<tab>I've got a new idea, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'll leave the ideas to Gyofu─that is my idea! Yes, yes. Please, come with me. Let us hear what wisdom Gyofu has to offer.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_000<tab><spotz> Gyofu hat bestimmt 'nen Tipp für mich, wie ich endlich reich werde. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, komm du auch mit. Du sollst dir auch anhören, was er vorschlägt.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_001<tab>What is it now? Gyorin looks more depressed than usual. More down, more despondent.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_001<tab>Was'n los, Gyorin? <glubsch> Machst'n Gesicht wie 'n Trauerfffisch ...

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_010<tab>Gyofu, Gyofu! I have something to ask of you, and I want you to tell me all you know.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_010<tab>Gyofu, alte Flosse. Ich dachte, du kannst mir vielleicht weiterhelfen.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_011<tab>That much I can do. What is it, Gyorin? You're not looking your normal chipper self.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_011<tab><schmatz> Was' denn los? Blubber's schon aus.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_012<tab>I've been reading my emakimono. They tell of so many ways to make one's fortune, and I've tried them all. Each one, every one. But I have yet to meet with any success.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_012<tab><spotz> Ich wollt doch reich werden und hab alles Mögliche probiert, was in einer Bildrolle steht, aber nix davon hat fffunktioniert.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_013<tab>And so I want to ask you, Gyofu. If you were in my barbels, what would you do? Do you know of any path I can walk to quick wealth? Any at all?
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_013<tab><glubsch> Da dacht ich, der Gyofu weiß vielleicht 'ne Methode, wie ich reich werden kann ...

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_014<tab>A quick path to wealth? Hmmm... I suppose there is one thought that comes to mind. But it is dangerous. Very dangerous, indeed.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_014<tab>Reich werden, hm? Ich wüsst da was, ist aber 'n bisschen gefffährlich.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_015<tab>Do you know of the ruins that lie to the east of here? They were once a Garlean stronghold. Within them there still remain all manner of weapons, relics from the days of war. At least that is what the rumors say. Yes, yes.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_015<tab>Du kennst doch die Ruinen von dem garleischen Stützpunkt im Osten, oder? <schmatz> Angeblich liegt da noch Ausrüstung von den Soldaten rum.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_016<tab>There just might be some treasure there. Weapons so fine they would put even the smiths of Doma to shame. Maybe, maybe not. I cannot say for sure.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_016<tab>Womöglich schlummern dort verborgene Schätze, die darauf warten, gefunden zu werden.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_017<tab>But what I can say for sure is this─those ruins and the way to them are fraught with peril. Lupin turned looters prowl the place. Monstrous hounds called taoquan lurk in the shadows. There is no wealth to be had in death, Gyorin. No, no. You should not go to this place.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_017<tab><spotz> Doch dort wimmelt es von Banditen und gefffährlichen Taoquan ... Reichtum nutzt dir nix, wenn du tot bist!

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_018<tab>Treasures! Relics! It is more than I hoped for. Thank you, Gyofu. I knew I was right to ask you.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_018<tab><glubsch> Hast du gerade „Schätze“ gesagt!? Das ist 'n toller Tipp! Besten Dank!

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_019<tab>It would not be a quick path to wealth if it were not dangerous along the way. That, too, was written in my emakimono. I will go to these ruins, and I will find my fortune!
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_019<tab>Wer nix wagt, der nix gewinnt - das stand auch auf der Bildrolle ♪

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_020<tab>Still, I do not stand much of a chance against Lupin and taoquan and whatever other dangers may come. Hmmm... Of course! You'll come with me, won't you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? I knew that you would. Yes, yes. Come, then. Let us away!
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_020<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, du musst aber mitkommen! Sonst hab ich Angst. <schmatz> Lass uns gleich aufffbrechen, ja?

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_021<tab>Gyorin never was one to listen to words of warning. I hate to burden you, but do look after him.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_021<tab>Gyorin hört nur, was er hören will ... Kannst du bitte auf ihn aufffpassen?

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_030<tab>I've no idea how I made it this far without being seen. Not spotted, not smelled. Maybe I have a talent for going undetected. I wonder if that is a skill I could use to get rich...
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_030<tab><spotz> Es ist unglaublich, bisher hat mich kein Monster bemerkt! Vielleicht hab ich 'n Talent, meine Präsenz zu verbergen?

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_031<tab>I will think more on it later. For now, let us keep the pace. I will make it all the way to the Garlean ruins without a soul other than you and I knowing of it. Yes, yes.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_031<tab>Wenn's so weitergeht, schaff ich's ungesehn bis in die Ruinen hinein!

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_040<tab>I've made it without a single beast or fiend taking notice of me. All too easy. But now for the hard part─to find whatever treasures await!
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_040<tab>Die Monster haben mich überhaupt nicht bemerkt. <glubsch> Jetzt wird's ernst! Wir müssen 'nen Schatz finden!

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_041<tab>By the by, I did see a horde of some rather mean-looking Lupin just over there. Very nasty, very feral.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_041<tab>Da drüben hab ich übrigens ganz gruselige Wolfswesen entdeckt!

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_042<tab>So, here is my plan. While I search these containers for anything worth selling, you create a diversion and lure the Lupin away from me. Yes, yes. You are an adventurer. Surely you live for quests such as this.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_042<tab><spotz> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, du bist doch stark! Kannst du dich um die kümmern, damit ich im Container nach Schätzen suchen kann, die sich verkaufffen lassen?

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_050<tab>The perfect diversion! Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I could hear the din of battle while I searched. I wanted desperately to come and help you, but I managed to stay true to my task. And lo, I found some relics that look quite valuable to my eye.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_050<tab>Danke, dass du dich um die Zottel gekümmert hast! Ich war auch fleißig! <schmatz> Hab was Tolles gefunden! ♪

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_051<tab>I will head back to the manor and show them to Gyofu. He will know if there is anything here worth selling. And I have a feeling that this time there is! Must be, has to be!
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_051<tab>Wie toll es ist, muss Gyofu sagen. Hoffentlich kann ich es verkaufffen ...

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_052<tab>Gyorin is looking quite pleased with himself, isn't he? I wonder what has gotten into him.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_052<tab>So gut war Gyorin ja lange nicht drauf. Warum er wohl so gute Laune hat?

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_060<tab>Look, Gyofu. I've returned from the Garlean ruins, and here is my haul. What do you think? Do you see anything here that will fetch a fair price at market?
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_060<tab><glubsch> Gyofu, hab in der Ruine was gefunden, das wertvoll aussieht! Was meinst du?

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_061<tab>You truly went to the ruins!? <var 1A 02 /var>And<var 1A 01 /var> returned to speak of it? You're a braver Namazu than most, Gyorin. Courageous, bold. Come, then. Show me what you have.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_061<tab>Ihr seid wirklich dort hingegangen ... und zurückgekehrt! <glubsch> Beeindruckend! <glubsch> Zeig mal her ...

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_062<tab>Hmmm... This piece is very fine, indeed. And this one, as well. A truly fortuitous find.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_062<tab>Hm hm ... Sehr gut. Damit lässt sich was anfangen.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_064<tab>Well done, Gyorin! Every weapon here looks to be valuable. They need a bit of touching up here and there, but yes, yes, they will fetch you a good deal of coin.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_064Gut gemacht, Gyorin!
Ein paar kleine Reparaturen und diese Waffen sind wieder einsatzbereit.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_065<tab>The Garleans have been flushed out from Doma, but the Domans still have need of arms to defend themselves. These weapons you've collected will certainly sell, and sell quickly.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_065<tab>Die Garlear sind zwar vertrieben, aber die Bewohner von Doma brauchen immer noch Waffen. Die kannst du auf jeden Fall verkaufffen!

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_066<tab>There are many Domans who still wish to fight the Garleans to the last. They will be more than willing to take these weapons off your hands, and part with a pretty gil to do so.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_066<tab>Die Bewohner von Doma sind noch in Kämpfe gegen die Garlear verwickelt und brauchen Waffen. Die kannst du auf jeden Fall verkaufffen!

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_067<tab>Do you think so? Truly? I finally found something worth selling? Worth peddling, worth vending?
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_067<tab><schmatz> Wirklich? Ich hab endlich was, das ich verkaufffen kann!?

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_068<tab>Have you ever known Gyofu to give a false appraisal? No, no. Your dream is at hand, Gyorin. Sell these weapons. Take the coin you make, and with it you can start down the path to becoming a legendary merchant!
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYOFU_000_068<tab>Garantiert! Und den Erlös solltest du wieder investieren! <glubsch> Dann bist du bald wirklich reich und nicht nur im Traum.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_069<tab>I will. I will. Starting this day! I am going to open my own shop. I will name it The New Rich! Customers will flock to my doors from all over Yanxia. Yes, yes. My business will thrive and my coffers will overflow. And my barbels will guide me to greatness!
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_069<tab><spotz> Geht klar! Ich werd 'n Geschäft aufmachen und es „Raffkes Rüstkammer“ nennen! Die Leute werden Schlange stehen<var 1D /var>- ich spüre es in meinen Barteln!

source: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_070<tab>Thank you for all your help, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You have been with me through it all. I will not forget you when I am at the top.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ428_02751_GYORIN_000_070<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, danke, dass du mir so lange geholfffen hast. <glubsch> Hab ich alles dir zu verdanken!
